title: Coridden Directly Download
description: In this Action RPG you are a monster-shifter, equipped with the ability to shapeshift into the beasts you defeat. Venture out alone or in CO-OP with up to 3 friends on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed inside the legendary city of Aasha. Grow your powers by finding new equipment and learning skills for both your human and beast form to become strong enough to save what you hold dear. ReSetna

system_requirements.Processor: AMD FX-8320 (3.5 GHz) / Intel i5-4690K (3.5 GHz)
